entities.name: COMPANY
entities.description: The entity responsible for implementing, administering, and managing the Plan, which includes collecting and processing personal information.

entities.name: SCHWAB
entities.description: Charles Schwab & Co., Inc. and its affiliated companies, assisting the Company with the implementation, administration, and management of the Plan.

entities.name: PARTICIPANTS
entities.description: Individuals who are granted Restricted Stock Units under the Plan and whose personal information is collected and processed by the Company and Schwab.

relationships.relationship_description: Schwab assists the Company with the implementation, administration, and management of the Plan.
The Company collects and processes personal information of the Participants to implement, administer, and manage the Plan.
Schwab assists in the management and administration of the Plan for the Participants.
